effect.x_y: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.

short_effect.x_y: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.

flavor_text.x_y: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.
